thread.title: Dave Billingsley

author: Dave Billingsley
title: Dave Billingsley
text: Just received my glasses yesterday. First time I have attempted to order glasses online. I'm new to wearing glasses again after a 35 year break. I really do like these. Much more than the pair I just got from the Optometrist's office a few weeks ago. Those cost $250.00 by the way (covered by insurance.) These are much lighter and more comfortable. They don't have the adjustable nose pads which I hate so much. The prescription is accurate. All around I'm very pleased so far. This was a free pair offered to first time buyers. I upgraded the lenses and added several of the various coatings and I still only paid $35.75 including shipping charges. I will definitely use Firmoo.com again when the need arises.
